name: Franky Fermata's Musical Maze of Madness
name_original: Franky Fermata's Musical Maze of Madness
description:
ACMI Screen It 2019 Middle Videogame Winner

Every Musical note cries for a hero in the heart of the Musical Maze of Madness. Join Sunny on his quest to be a hero and defeat Franky Fermata as he travels through the Musical Maze of Madness to find the hiding notes. Watch out for the Munchers and remember to listen. If all else fails, you'd better go SUPER DOOPER NOVA.
